title: Why Do AFK Players Who Return For Most of The Game Not Get LP?
body: If anything that discourages them from coming back and sticking to their alternate account until the game is over. Maybe halve the LP gain instead? It's a really ill-thought policy.

replies.body: I dont really care about this issue, as i rarely play ranked, but i cant deny that it seems odd to block them from any LP gain even if they come back 5 minutes into the game and perform greatly.
so they don't leech the lp their teammates worked hard for.

> [{quoted}](name=simply bad,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xrMVPHT8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-05T00:07:50.585+0000)
>
> so they don't leech the lp their teammates worked hard for.

Yeah that's included in my proposal. I'm sure we could agree on like a 80% total game time threshold or above. This would also be including people who have a connection issue for whatever reason in the game and don't intend to AFK. However, the current system is going to punish them even if they come back, which wouldn't be fair.
